document.full_text: while poverty is usually associated with greater health risks, a study published monday suggests that young teens from middle- to higher-income families may be somewhat more likely than their less affluent peers to use alcohol.
document.title: teens from wealthier families may drink more
lines_and_colors: while poverty is usually associated with greater health risks, a study published monday suggests that young teens from middle- to higher-income families may be somewhat more likely than their less affluent peers to use alcohol.
